channel.title: When you die on my server , you dont lose items
channel.description:
How the heck do i fix this ?
Honestly ,this is confusing, please please help

item.title: When you die on my server , you dont lose items
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

very simple,
you posted in the wrong place, this is done on your serverside.

in your client.java or where ever your death sequence is look for the code where it defines what items are dropped, most likely its not there, so ull have to leech off another server. if not its because ur a admin/owner.

Read full topic
item.source: When you die on my server , you dont lose items
